welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Hilton Head Island! Known for its pristine beaches and charming atmosphere, we invite you to relax, explore, and soak up all the island has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hilton Head Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hilton Head Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of County Airport, where all domestic and international flights are served.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Hunter AAF Airport.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves primarily Delta and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport serves primarily American Airlines and Allegiant Air flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.
